attributes.action: Divert Vaccinations to NHS staff now
attributes.additional_details:
The NHS is facing winter and COVID pressures. NHS staff:

1. Cannot choose to minimise exposure
2. Can spread it to patients 
3. Are leaving hospitals short staffed as they go off sick with Covid 19

The vaccine needs to be diverted now
attributes.background: Divert vaccinations to NHS staff now as a matter of priority.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/562854
